title: Khoni Central Park
about: Khoni Central Park is located in the Imereti region, the city of Khoni. It was built in the 40s of the XIX century and the locals call it a boulevard. Khoni Central Park is one of the best places in the city to unwind and relax. Walking trails, resting benches and lawns are arranged in the garden. The park is hidden in the trees and has a ceremonial gate with columns. Khoni Boulevard is a nice place to stroll and unwind with friends or family.
